document_data.mainbody: '''Bestial domain''' was a deity domain that granted [[divine]] spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with bestial [[spell]]s and powers.{{cite book/Book of Vile Darkness|80}}
document_data.Powers: As well an assortment of bestial spells, these [[cleric]]s gained much a heightened sense of smell, which could be used to track down or sniff out enemies.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[magic fang]]'', ''[[bull's strength]]'', and ''[[greater magic fang]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[claws of the savage]]'', ''[[charm monster]]'', and ''[[hold monster]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[whirlwind of teeth]]'', ''[[spread of savagery]]'', and ''[[were-doom]]''.
